DOC.brief_summary: To determine efficacy safety zidovudine ( AZT ) versus didanosine ( ddI ) , AZT plus ddI , AZT plus zalcitabine ( ddC ) prevent disease progression HIV-infected patient CD4 count 200-500 cells/mm3 .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized , Double-Blind Phase II/III Trial Monotherapy v . Combination Therapy With Nucleoside Analogs HIV-Infected Persons With CD4 Cells 200-500/mm3
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomize receive AZT alone , AZT ddI , AZT ddC , ddI alone least 2 year . Patients develop AIDS whose CD4 count fall 50 percent less baseline cross another treatment arm . PER AMENDMENT 4/5/95 : Study treatment available 10/31/95 late patient still take study medication 4/30/95 , follow-up trial may complete approve .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Concurrent Medication : Allowed : PCP prophylaxis , M. tuberculosis prophylaxis , short course acyclovir , chronic suppressive acyclovir , pneumovax Hib vaccine , antibiotic , rEPO GCSF grade 3 bad anemia neutropenia , systemic corticosteroid < 21 day , regularly prescribed medication , vitamin herbal therapy . Patients must : HIV infection without AIDS CD4 200500 cells/mm3 . PER AMENDMENT 4/5/95 : Patients must remain ACTG 175 study treatment 4/30/95 meet toxicity management criterion continue treatment . Subjects take ACTG 175 crossover treatment eligible . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow condition exclude : Current AIDSrelated condition minimal KS , grade 2 bad peripheral neuropathy , malignancy require systemic therapy . Concurrent Medication : Excluded : Other antiHIV drug , biologic response modifier rEPO GCSF , systemic cytotoxic chemotherapy , chronic systemic corticosteroid , drug affect AZT glucuronidation clearance . Concurrent Treatment : Excluded : Radiotherapy limit local therapy skin . Patients follow prior condition exclude : AIDSrelated condition minimal KS ; intolerance AZT , ddI , ddC study dose ; acute chronic pancreatitis . Prior Medication : Excluded : Acute therapy infection medical illness within past 14 day . Current alcohol abuse .
